name: The China Shop
summary: The elderly owner of a china shop leaves for the night, and the various figurines and decorated mugs come to life. A demonic figure captures an upper-class lady and does battle with her lord, damaging much of the shop. But the demon proves to have a glass jaw and, literally, a yellow streak, and the happy couple is soon reunited. No dialogue, but some signs are in English, particularly the final punch-line.
info:
• 中文名: 陶瓷店
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1934-01-13
  • 片长: 8min
  • 语言: 英语
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Wilfred Jackson
